dailyDharma.heading: Begin Your Journey to Inner Peace

dailyDharma.findPeaceTitle: Find Peace and Clarity with Daily Practices
dailyDharma.findPeaceSubtitle1: Simple routines to support your well-being, tailored for you.
dailyDharma.findPeaceSubtitle2: Make dharma a part of your daily rhythm. This space offers bite-sized practices â€” chants, affirmations, reflections, and mindful rituals â€” designed to ground you in inner peace and purpose. Start your day with spiritual clarity and return whenever your soul needs a reset.

dailyDharma.step2Subtitle: Pick 1â€“3 daily rituals to build a simple practice that fits your life.
dailyDharma.step3Subtitle: Stay consistent and reflect on your growth through gentle daily tracking.

dailyDharma.quote: â€œWith a pure heart, every moment becomes a sacred practice.â€
dailyDharma.faqDescription: KalpX Daily Practice. Show up every day â€” and watch the shift begin.
dailyDharma.familySubtitle1: Come together in devotion before meals, growing in spirit as a family.
dailyDharma.familySubtitle2: Strengthen family bonds through shared rituals that connect you to Sanatan Dharma, fostering love, gratitude, and cultural heritage in every meal.
dailyDharma.familyFooter: Create a shared journey for peace and connection!
dailyDharma.faq1Title: Why build a daily spiritual practice?
dailyDharma.faq1Desc:
In a world of constant noise, daily spiritual practice is a quiet anchor. It grounds your energy, purifies your intent, and gently brings you back to what matters. KalpX offers simple, accessible practices â€” from morning chants and breathwork to evening reflection and gratitude â€” so that spirituality becomes not a task, but a rhythm.

Whether you light a diya before work, repeat a mantra on your commute, or take 2 minutes to sit in silence before sleep â€” these small rituals create big shifts over time. Consistency becomes connection. Repetition becomes realization.

Let KalpX help you infuse your everyday with purpose, presence, and peace.
dailyDharma.faq2Title: What youâ€™ll find in Daily Practice
dailyDharma.faq2Desc:
âœ” Morning invocations, chants, and affirmations to start the day
âœ” Guided meditations for clarity, energy, and calm
âœ” Breathwork and grounding techniques based in yogic science
âœ” Short reflections on dharma, gratitude, and intention-setting
âœ” Evening wind-down rituals and sacred closing prayers
âœ” Bite-sized stories and teachings for daily inspiration
âœ” Practices designed for all ages, including children and elders
dailyDharma.faq3Desc:
âœ” Anyone looking to cultivate inner calm and consistency
âœ” Beginners unsure where to start with spiritual habits
âœ” Parents wanting simple rituals to share with their kids
âœ” Professionals needing short, grounding pauses in their day
âœ” Seekers seeking structure without pressure
âœ” Elders returning to daily devotion

dailyDharma.faq5Desc:
âœ” Spiritually potent, yet simple and practical

explore.title: Explore Videos
explore.subtitle: Reconnect with Your Roots â€” Start Watching

faq.title: Why Explore Spiritual Videos?
faq.description: In a fast-moving world, we often forget to pause and reflect. KalpX Videos offer a moment to reconnect â€” with timeless wisdom, inspiring stories, sacred movement, and devotional depth â€” wherever you are. Whether youâ€™re watching a classical Bharatanatyam performance, a sacred mantra chant, a ritual from a temple, or a short teaching on karma or consciousness, each video opens a window into Sanatan Dharmaâ€™s living heartbeat. Youâ€™ll also find guided meditations, yoga practices, spiritual music, and cultural storytelling â€” all curated to help you grow in awareness, devotion, and joy. Let these visuals transport you beyond the screen â€” into a space of reverence, inquiry, and inner clarity. Watch alone, with family, or as part of your daily spiritual rhythm.

faq.title: What Youâ€™ll Find in Explore Videos
faq.description:
â€¢ âœ” Teachings on dharma, consciousness, and inner peace
â€¢ âœ” Rituals and poojas from sacred temples across Bharat
â€¢ âœ” Classical Indian dance (Bharatanatyam, Odissi, Kathak & more)
â€¢ âœ” Guided yoga, meditation, and breathwork rooted in tradition
â€¢ âœ” Devotional music, bhajans, kirtans, and mantra chanting
â€¢ âœ” Stories from the Ramayana, Mahabharata, and Puranas
â€¢ âœ” Culturally rich videos for children and families
â€¢ âœ” Dialogues with gurus, yogis, artists, and wisdom keepers

faq.title: Who Are Curated KalpX Videos For?
faq.description:
â€¢ âœ” Spiritual seekers and lifelong learners
â€¢ âœ” Diaspora audiences reconnecting with their heritage
â€¢ âœ” Artists, dancers, yogis, and musicians honoring sacred traditions
â€¢ âœ” Parents introducing dharma to children in engaging ways
â€¢ âœ” Anyone looking for screen time that uplifts, educates, and transforms

faq.title: What Makes Curated KalpX Videos Different?
faq.description:
â€¢ âœ” Authentic, lineage-rooted content curated with care
â€¢ âœ” Visuals that inspire devotion, stillness, and self-inquiry
â€¢ âœ” Diverse voices, regional traditions, and cultural depth
â€¢ âœ” Made for transformation â€” not just passive viewing

faq.title: How Can I Find Videos That Interest Me?
faq.description:
â€¢ âœ” Use the search bar to find specific topics.
â€¢ âœ” Filter by category, language, or tags to narrow down your selection.
â€¢ âœ” Toggle the Kids Hub for family-friendly content.

faq.title: Are the Videos Available in Multiple Languages?
faq.description:

â€¢ âœ” Select your preferred language from the filters to view relevant content.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: KalpX ("we", "our", or "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you access or use the KalpX platform, including through our website or mobile applications.
privacy.section1Content:
Information You Provide: Name, email, optional profile info.
Automatically Collected: UUID, video events, IP, browser, etc.
privacy.section2Content: To authenticate users, personalize content, track engagement, improve KalpX, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell your data. We may share it with hosting, analytics, or legal entities as needed.
privacy.section4Content: Used to remember your preferences, track engagement anonymously, and improve recommendations.
privacy.section5Content: SSL, authentication controls, and limited access are used to keep your data safe.
privacy.section6Content: You can access, update, or delete your data. Contact us any time.
privacy.section7Content: To delete your KalpX account and data, email us at support@kalpx.com with subject line: "Delete My KalpX Account".
